reasoning: VTE encompasses DVT and PE. Incidence data from multiple population-based studies shows ~100-200 per 100k in Western populations. Using mid-range estimate of 117 per 100k based on pooled epidemiological data circa 2005.
source: Heit JA et al. (2005). The epidemiology of venous thromboembolism. J Thromb Thrombolysis. 21(1):23-29
